messages.content:
I want you to analyze this website and summarize it for me:
{{10.array[].domain}}

Array.description: Please create a instagram post based on a topic in the niche which is listed below. The post should be engaging and hook the reader to want to engage through liking, commenting and sharing the post. Make sure to use any relevant hashtags to increase exposure at the end of the post. For example, #hashtag_1, hashtag_2. Also make sure to use a tasteful amount of emojis where applicable (do not overdo this)

Please create a Facebook post based on a topic in the niche which is listed below. The post should be engaging and hook the reader to want to engage through liking, commenting and sharing the post. Make sure to use any relevant hashtags to increase exposure at the end of the post. For example, #hashtag_1, hashtag_2

Please create a blog based on a topic in the niche which is listed below. The post should be well-researched, engaging, and crafted to keep readers interested from start to finish. Focus on delivering value through insights, storytelling, or in-depth analysis, and encourage readers to engage by commenting, and sharing the post. Conclude with a call to action or thought-provoking question, and include relevant tags at the end to increase discoverability. For example, #tag1, #tag2.

Please create a twitter post based on a topic in the niche which is listed below. The tweet should be engaging and hook the reader to want to engage. Please keep the length of the tweet to under the 280 character limit. Make sure to use any relevant hashtags to increase exposure. For example, #hashtag_1, hashtag_2

Please create a pinterest post based on a topic in the niche which is listed below. The pin should be visually appealing and designed to catch the viewer's attention instantly. Use clear, concise text on the image to convey the key message, and make sure the pin encourages viewers to click through for more information. The length should be no more than 800 characters, at a maximum. Include relevant keywords and hashtags in the pin description to increase visibility. For example, #keyword1, #keyword2.

Please create a linkedin post based on a topic in the niche which is listed below. Make the post engaging by asking a question, sharing an insight, or encouraging discussion. Keep it concise but thought-provoking, and include a call to action, such as inviting readers to share their thoughts or read the full article

messages.content: Please make sure this post is polished and ready to be published. Do not include custom variables such as [Name], **insert link here***.
Please do not generate HTML or markdown. Make sure this is plain text

mapper.prompt:
Please generate an image based on this topic:
{{substring(20.result; 0; 3800)}}.

Please make sure not to include any text, letters, numbers or digits. Just an image. That's it.

messages.message: A transformer should not be the last module in the route.
The module is not connected to the data flow.

mapper.input: Hey Jono, it's Jono from Jono Marketing. I just came across your site and realize you don't spend a ton of time on social media marketing. I want to put together content calendar and send it your way for free with social media posts, and images. Would love to know your thoughts on this! Have a great day

mapper.subject: Social Media Calendar For {{24.array[].array[].domain}}
mapper.html:
Hey Jono,

I recently visited your website and noticed an opportunity to enhance your social media presence. To help you get started, I've created a personalized content calendar for you, complete with suggested content, images, and scheduling.

I hope this resource makes it easier for you to engage with your audience and grow your online presence!

You can access it here:
{{30.shareLink}}

If you have any questions or would like to discuss how to implement this plan further, feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Jono
